dct_title_s: Nieuwe kaart van de eilanden Zuid en Noord Beveland, Wolfersdyk en de heerlykheden van Vosmaar, Tolen, Poortvliet, Martensdyk & : met de nieuwe bedykinge als mede van t marquisaat van Bergen
dct_description_sm: Map of Zuid Beveland and Noord Beveland in the Dutch province of Zeeland. Relief shown pictorially. The widow and sons of Joachim Ottens continued the business after his death in 1719. The sons succeeded to the business after their mother's death in 1725. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
dct_publisher_sm: Te Amsterdam : by de Wed. Ottens en zoone, [between 1719 and 1725]
